mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(LMB.FIRST_NAME, TCM.FIRST_NAME) AS FIRST_NAME, IFNULL(LMB.LAST_NAME, TCM.LAST_NAME) AS LAST_NAME, IFNULL(LMB.BUSINESS_NAME, TCM.BUSINESS_NAME) AS BUSINESS_NAME, IFNULL(LMB.MEMBER_TYPE, TCM.CUSTOMER_TYPE) AS MEMBER_TYPE, IFNULL(LMB.TITLE, TCM.TITLE) AS TITLE, IFNULL(LMB.PHONE_NO, TCM.PHONE_NO) AS PHONE_NO, IFNULL(LMB.EMAIL, TCM.EMAIL) AS EMAIL, LC.CASE_NUMBER, LC.DETAIL, LC.TYPE, LC.SUBTYPE, LC.PRIORITY, LC.STATUS, LC.CHANNEL, LC.OWNER, LC.SUBJECT, LC.OPENED_DATE, LC.CLOSED_DATE, LC.BU_ID, LC.CUSTOMER_ID, LC.CREATED_DATE, LC.CREATED_BY, LC.UPDATED_DATE, LC.UPDATED_BY, CONCAT(USR.FIRST_NAME,' ',USR.LAST_NAME) AS displayName, CB1.CODE_NAME AS typeName, CB2.CODE_NAME AS subTypeName, CB3.CODE_NAME AS priorityName FROM TB_CASE LC INNER JOIN TB_USER USR ON LC.OWNER = USR.ID INNER JOIN TB_CODEBOOK CB1 ON LC.TYPE = CB1.CODE_ID AND CB1.CODE_TYPE = 'CASE_TYPE' INNER JOIN TB_CODEBOOK CB2 ON LC.SUBTYPE = CB2.CODE_ID AND CB2.CODE_TYPE = 'CASE_SUBTYPE' INNER JOIN TB_CODEBOOK CB3 ON LC.PRIORITY = CB3.CODE_ID AND CB3.CODE_TYPE = 'CASE_PRIORITY' INNER JOIN TB_CUSTOMER TCM ON LC.CUSTOMER_ID = TCM.CUSTOMER_ID LEFT JOIN LOY_MEMBER LMB ON LC.CUSTOMER_ID = LMB.CUSTOMER_ID WHERE (CASE_NUMBER = #{caseNumber}) limit 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_CASE ( CASE_NUMBER, CONSULTING_NUMBER, TYPE, SUBTYPE, PRIORITY, STATUS, CHANNEL, SUBJECT, DETAIL, CONTACT_NAME, CUSTOMER_ID, OWNER, OPENED_DATE, CLOSED_DATE, BU_ID, CREATED_DATE, CREATED_BY, UPDATED_DATE, UPDATED_BY ) VALUES ( #{caseNumber}, #{consultingNumber}, #{type}, #{subType}, #{priority}, #{status}, #{channel}, #{subject}, #{detail}, #{contactName}, #{customerId}, #{owner}, NOW(), #{closedDate}, #{buId}, NOW(), #{createdBy}, NOW(), #{updatedBy} )
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_CASE SET TYPE = #{type}, SUBTYPE = #{subType}, PRIORITY = #{priority}, STATUS = #{status}, CHANNEL = #{channel}, DETAIL = #{detail}, SUBJECT = #{subject}, OWNER = #{owner}, CLOSED_DATE = CASE WHEN (#{status} = '04') THEN NOW() ELSE NULL END, BU_ID = #{buId}, UPDATED_DATE = NOW(), UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy} WHERE (CASE_NUMBER = #{caseNumber})
